title: I tanuva
sahitya:
I tanuva nambalu bEDo jIvane


anupallavi

  anuvAgi ninnangake kelakAla tOruvudO anuvilladAga I tanuve ninage vairi


caraNam 1    jareyu maraNadinda bharitavAdudI kAya sthiravendu nambi nI maruLAga bEDa
    caraNam 2    dhana dhAnya pashu patni sthiravendu tiLidu manumathanayyana mareyade manave
    caraNam 3    sharaNavendavara kAva garuDakEtana namma purandara viTalanna mareyade manave
